summary: This document is a draft summary of Ghislaine Maxwell's credit card accounts as of July 2, 2020, prepared for discussion purposes. It lists various credit card accounts held by Maxwell, some jointly or as a sub-account holder, along with their statuses and balances.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The primary subject of the financial summary, listed as the holder or sub-account holder on multiple credit card accounts from various institutions.

persons.name: Theodore W Waitt
persons.context: Listed as the primary account holder for an American Express credit card where Ghislaine Maxwell is listed as a sub-account holder; the account was closed in September 2010.

persons.name: Scott G Borgerson
persons.context: Listed as the primary account holder for a USAA credit card where Ghislaine Maxwell (listed as Ghislaine Borgerson) is a sub-account holder; the account had a balance as of November 2019 and its status is unknown.

connections.description: Maxwell was listed as a sub-account holder on a credit card account where Waitt was the primary holder.
Maxwell (listed as Ghislaine Borgerson) was listed as a sub-account holder on a credit card account where Borgerson was the primary holder.

keyFacts: As of July 2020, Ghislaine Maxwell had at least one open credit card account (American Express) with an outstanding balance of $955 as of December 2019.
Maxwell was a sub-account holder on a credit card belonging to Scott G. Borgerson (where she is listed as Ghislaine Borgerson) with an outstanding balance of $5,958 as of November 2019.
Multiple credit card accounts previously held by Maxwell or associated with her were closed between 2010 and 2019.
The document is explicitly marked as a 'DRAFT FOR DISCUSSION PURPOSES ONLY', indicating it was part of an internal or investigative review process.
